001package tagalong.subsystems.micro.confs;
002
003import com.ctre.phoenix6.configs.CurrentLimitsConfigs;
004import com.ctre.phoenix6.signals.InvertedValue;
005import com.ctre.phoenix6.signals.NeutralModeValue;
006import tagalong.controls.FeedforwardConstants;
007import tagalong.controls.PIDSGVAConstants;
008import tagalong.devices.Motors;
009import tagalong.units.AccelerationUnits;
010import tagalong.units.DistanceUnits;
011import tagalong.units.VelocityUnits;
012
013/**
014 * Configuration for the flywheel
015 */
016public class FlywheelConf extends RollerConf {
017  /**
018   *
019   * @param name                          name of the subsystem
020   * @param motorTypes                    array of motor types used
021   * @param motorDeviceIDs                CAN IDs of the motors
022   * @param motorCanBus                   CAN buses which the motors are connected to
023   * @param motorDirection                motor inversion settings
024   * @param motorEnabledBrakeMode         brake mode when motors are enabled
025   * @param motorDisabledBrakeMode        brake mode when motors are disabled
026   * @param gearRatio                     gear ratios
027   * @param trapezoidalLengthUnit         units for trapezoidal motion length
028   * @param trapezoidalVelocityUnit       units for trapezoidal motion velocityODO
029   * @param trapezoidalLimitsVelocity     velocity limits for trapezoidal motion
030   * @param trapezoidalAccelerationUnit   units for trapezoidal motion acceleration
031   * @param trapezoidalLimitsAcceleration acceleration limits for trapezoidal motion
032   * @param defaultTolerancesUnit         default unit of the tolerance values
033   * @param defaultLowerTolerance         default lower tolerance
034   * @param defaultUpperTolerance         default upper tolerance
035   * @param feedForward                   feedforward constants
036   * @param simFeedForward                simulated feedforward constants
037   * @param currentLimitsConfigs          current limit configurations
038   * @param slot0                         PID slot 0 configuration
039   * @param slot1                         PID slot 1 configuration
040   * @param slot2                         PID slot 2 configuration
041   * @param simSlot0                      simulated PID slot 0 configuration
042   * @param simSlot1                      simulated PID slot 1 configuration
043   * @param simSlot2                      simulated PID slot 2 configuration
044   * @param simNumLigaments               number of simulated ligaments used
045   * @param rollerMOI                     moment of inertia for the roller
046   */
047  public FlywheelConf(
048      String name,
049      Motors[] motorTypes,
050      int[] motorDeviceIDs,
051      String[] motorCanBus,
052      InvertedValue[] motorDirection,
053      NeutralModeValue[] motorEnabledBrakeMode,
054      NeutralModeValue[] motorDisabledBrakeMode,
055      int[][] gearRatio,
056      DistanceUnits trapezoidalLengthUnit,
057      VelocityUnits trapezoidalVelocityUnit,
058      double trapezoidalLimitsVelocity,
059      AccelerationUnits trapezoidalAccelerationUnit,
060      double trapezoidalLimitsAcceleration,
061      DistanceUnits defaultTolerancesUnit,
062      double defaultLowerTolerance,
063      double defaultUpperTolerance,
064      FeedforwardConstants feedForward,
065      FeedforwardConstants simFeedForward,
066      CurrentLimitsConfigs currentLimitsConfigs,
067      PIDSGVAConstants slot0,
068      PIDSGVAConstants slot1,
069      PIDSGVAConstants slot2,
070      PIDSGVAConstants simSlot0,
071      PIDSGVAConstants simSlot1,
072      PIDSGVAConstants simSlot2,
073      int simNumLigaments,
074      double rollerMOI
075
076  ) {
077    super(
078        name,
079        motorTypes,
080        motorDeviceIDs,
081        motorCanBus,
082        motorDirection,
083        motorEnabledBrakeMode,
084        motorDisabledBrakeMode,
085        gearRatio,
086        trapezoidalLengthUnit,
087        VelocityUnits.ROTATIONS_PER_SECOND,
088        trapezoidalVelocityUnit.convertX(
089            trapezoidalLimitsVelocity, VelocityUnits.ROTATIONS_PER_SECOND
090        ),
091        AccelerationUnits.ROTATIONS_PER_SECOND2,
092        trapezoidalAccelerationUnit.convertX(
093            trapezoidalLimitsAcceleration, AccelerationUnits.ROTATIONS_PER_SECOND2
094        ),
095        DistanceUnits.ROTATION,
096        defaultTolerancesUnit.convertX(defaultLowerTolerance, DistanceUnits.ROTATION),
097        defaultTolerancesUnit.convertX(defaultUpperTolerance, DistanceUnits.ROTATION),
098        feedForward,
099        simFeedForward,
100        currentLimitsConfigs,
101        slot0,
102        slot1,
103        slot2,
104        simSlot0,
105        simSlot1,
106        simSlot2,
107        simNumLigaments,
108        rollerMOI
109    );
110
111    for (int i = 0; i < numMotors; i++) {
112      motorConfig[i].MotorOutput.PeakReverseDutyCycle = 0.0;
113      motorConfig[i].Voltage.PeakReverseVoltage = 0.0;
114    }
115  }
116}
